wikipedia_page.main: Peter Wragg (12 January 1931 – 24 June 2004) was an English footballer who played as an inside forward.

link_mentions.page: List of York City F.C. seasons

response: * Peter Wragg (1946-2012), Award winning Visual Effects designer noted for BBC Doctor Who, Red Dwarf & Gerry Anderson’s Thunderbirds

link_mentions.page: List of Bradford City A.F.C. players

response: 21 players made at least one appearance in nationally organised first-team competition, and there were nine different goalscorers. Goalkeeper Tommy Forgan and forward Peter Wragg played in all 49 first-team matches over the season. Arthur Bottom finished as leading goalscorer with 22 goals, of which 21 came in league competition and one came in the FA Cup.
